Package net.tangly.erp.ledger.ui

package net.tangly.erp.ledger.ui

The accounts view and the transactions view display information from the same ledger. The coupling is visualized through the the tabs Accounts and Transactions of the overall ledger view.

The selection of the time interval of interest is provided on the ledger view and impacts all the tabs displayed in the ledger view, providing the visual clue for the user.

    Description
    AnalyticsLedgerView
     
    CmdCreateLedgerDocument
    Command to create a ledger document for a given period.
    CmdViewAccountTransactions
    Displays all the transactions of an account in a dialog.
